import React from 'react'; import Avatar from "../assets/user.png" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import styles from '../styles/Username.module.css' import {Toaster} from 'react-hot-toast' import {useFormik} from 'formik' import { registerValidation } from '../helper/validate'; export default function Profile() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { email:'', username:'', password:'' }, validate: registerValidation, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, onSubmit : async values => { console.log(values) } }) return(
